name: spirit-break
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.
